definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

pinyin: ge4 ren2 shu4 zi4 zhu4 li3

sentences.english: Asylum seeker numbers in Australia have reached 6900.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在澳寻求庇护者的人数已达6900人。

sentences.english: Total first-time enrolment of international graduate students rose 12 per cent this year.
sentences.chinese: 新录取的国际研究生总人数今年增加了12%。

sentences.english: When I finished counting the men I had left.
sentences.chinese: 待我清点完人数我就得出发。

sentences.english: Moses therefore took the money of them that were above, and whom they had redeemed from the Levites.
sentences.chinese: 梅瑟就为那超过肋未人数而应赎回的人，征收了赎金。

sentences.english: The centre reserves the right to cancel a programme if there is insufficient number of enrollments.
sentences.chinese: 如报读人数不足，本中心有权取消有关课程。

sentences.english: So far, a total of 327 contacts have been identified.
sentences.chinese: 迄今确定的接触者总人数为327人。

sentences.english: And the numbers are rising at the same time crime rates are dropping.
sentences.chinese: 被盘查的人数正在上升，同时犯罪率在下降。

sentences.english: Vaccine greatly reduces the number of polio cases.
sentences.chinese: 索克疫苗极大地减少了患病人数。

sentences.english: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
sentences.chinese: 当日，将书珊城被杀的人数呈在王前。

sentences.english: As a result, the number of Spanish HNWIs increased by 18%.
sentences.chinese: 结果是，西班牙的大富豪人数增加了18%。

sentences.english: The Indian patrol suffered 25 casualties, and the Chinese 33.
sentences.chinese: 印度巡逻队的伤亡人数是25，而中国伤亡了33人。

sentences.english: An initial police estimate put the number of participants at 8,000.
sentences.chinese: 警方初步估计参与游行的人数达到了8000。

sentences.english: They didn't exactly count noses, but the audience numbered at least five thousand.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有精确地清点人数，但听众至少有5000人。

sentences.english: Employment in U.S. furniture factories fell by 60% over the last decade.
sentences.chinese: 过去10年中，美国家具厂的就业人数减少了60%。

sentences.english: so you tend to move along in the program with a smaller group of students.
sentences.chinese: 所以你一般跟人数比较少的一组学生一起学这些课程。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童军的人数占这四个制服团体总人数的几分之几？

definition: person-times/visits/classifier for number of people participating
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
